Your cart is currently empty. Umami, that's good! SAVOR THE FLAVOR MISO, SEAWEED, TEA & MORE.. SHOP NOW DRIED, EDIBLE SEAWEED 20% OFF EMERALD COVE SEAWEED NORI, WAKAME, KOMBU & MORE.. SHOP SALES Our pledge Earth Day 2024 Every 1 lb tub of miso paste sold Removes 2 lbs of plastic waste from the Himalayan foothills. UP TO 1,000 UNITS SHOP MISO SHOP OUR BRANDS Our Eco-conscious Commitment Great Eastern Sun is dedicated to being an active participant in global solutions to reduce and repurpose plastic waste. About Plastic Neutral SHOP OUR PRODUCTS Organic Miso Paste Dried Edible Seaweed Organic Noodles Organic Japanese Teas Oils & Vinegars Condiments & Ingredients EXPLORE OUR RECIPES View all Marvelous Miso Hummus Apr 21, 2024 Originating in the middle east, hummus is made with chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic and spices. We gave this recipe our special touch with the addition of Miso Master organic, naturally fermented miso paste. Latest posts Miso Peanut Thai Sauce Mar 23, 2024 Discover how delicious and easy it is to use miso with this upgraded version of a classic peanut sauce.  Adding miso to savory dips and sauces gives your sauce another layer of yum! The Best Vegan Ponzu Sauce (Japanese Citrus Sauce) Feb 27, 2024 Ponzu sauce is a Japanese sauce frequently used as a dipping sauce or condiment for tempura, sashimi, gyoza or simple cold noodles.  Traditionally, ponzu sauce is made from shoyu or tamari (japanese soy sauces), mirin, rice vinegar, bonita flakes ( katsuobushi Wasabi Nori Seaweed Snack Chips Jan 10, 2024 This delightful little snack recipe is delicious and so easy to make!  We made a basic snack chip using sushi grade nori and real 100% wasabi powder.  These little gems are sure to satisfy those hungry, after school snackers, or a great accompaniment to some hummus and a cup of tea for a much needed afternoon break. Give this low calorie, delicious snack a spin and get two great ingredients into your diet this year. Creamy Wasabi Miso Dressing Dive into the zesty world of wasabi salad dressing and get ready for an explosion of flavor! This perfect combination of spice, flavor, and health will take your salads to the next level.  The subtle heat of wasabi complements the freshness of your salad greens, creating a vibrant taste that will tantalize your taste buds.  Why settle for ordinary when you can elevate your salads with the irresistible combination of spice, flavor, and health? thought: I now know the final answer Based on the observations, the website https://great-eastern-sun.com/ does not exhibit any characteristics of a scam website. Therefore, it is not a scam website.

observation.reason: The website does not display any of the common characteristics of a scam website such as unusually low prices, claims of free money, or targeting psychological weaknesses. Additionally, the information appears to be registered and updated, indicating a legitimate business operation.
